2025-0782
2025-11-06INFCCanada Infrastructure Bank ActReappointment of the Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Infrastructure BankApproval of the reappointment by the Board of Directors of the Canada Infrastructure Bank of Ehren Cory of Toronto, Ontario, as Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Infrastructure Bank, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective November 9, 2025.N/A
subject: Reappointment of the Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Infrastructure Bank
precis: Approval of the reappointment by the Board of Directors of the Canada Infrastructure Bank of Ehren Cory of Toronto, Ontario, as Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Infrastructure Bank, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective November 9, 2025.
